definition: to act prudently/steering a cautious course

sentences.english: But there are a few concerns.
sentences.chinese: 但有几点需要审慎考虑。

sentences.english: Mr. Dolittle attributes his good health to careful living.
sentences.chinese: 杜立德先生把自己健壮的体魄归功于审慎的生活方式。

sentences.english: The opportunity is often lost by deliberation--Selected.
sentences.chinese: 良好的机会，常是因审慎过度失去的。

sentences.english: Bardo's jealous ear was alive to the slight movement.
sentences.chinese: 巴尔多审慎的耳朵是不会放过任何轻微的响动的。

sentences.english: Philippe careful study of the invention after, Patek smell business opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 菲利普审慎的研究，发明之后，百达翡丽的气味商机。

sentences.english: You have to be endowed with the human values of circumspect mindfulness and reasonable discernment.
sentences.chinese: 你必须拥有审慎的念住与合理的明辨这个人类价值。

sentences.english: But prudence can't tell me what sentence to write next.
sentences.chinese: 但审慎不会告诉下一句话该写什么。

sentences.english: He turned the matter over in his mind slowly and deliberately .
sentences.chinese: 他把这问题在心上慢慢地审慎地反复推敲。

sentences.english: A prudent question is one-half of wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 一个审慎的问题就已经得到一半智慧了。

sentences.english: This also made it prudent to reconsider capital spending plans.
sentences.chinese: 这也迫使它审慎地重新考虑资本投资计划。

sentences.english: The government will require far more fiscal prudence in the future.
sentences.chinese: 政府在未来将会更为审慎地对待财政问题。

sentences.english: I have sober personality and have high sense of responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 我个性审慎稳重，具有高度的责任感。

sentences.english: American Electric Power (AEP), the nation's largest generator of electricity, also is taking a cautious approach.
sentences.chinese: 美国电力公司是美国最大的发电企业，同样行动审慎。

sentences.english: The government must be careful in its exercise of power.
sentences.chinese: 当局在利用其权利时必须鉴戒审慎。

sentences.english: Macroprudential supervision also presents communication issues.
sentences.chinese: 宏观审慎监管也有一个沟通的问题。

sentences.english: Mackintosh sounded a note of caution abut the near-term economic future.
sentences.chinese: 麦金托什对于近期经济前景的看法较为审慎。

definition: to consider/to give serious consideration to sth/consideration
to act prudently/steering a cautious course
to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision
to screen/to discriminate/to reexamine a case/screening (of applicants etc)
